Question: AIKiosQ CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AIKiosQ

AIKiosQ CES 2024

- AI-powered interactive kiosk
- 32-inch touch screen display
- Facial recognition for personalized user experience
- Integrated voice assistant for hands-free interaction
- Customizable branding options
- Built-in analytics for user engagement tracking
- Secure payment processing capabilities
- Remote management and content updates
- Sleek and modern design
